title: SignalK GET message schema
description: Schema for getting values of parts of a SignalK data model, for example the state of the anchor watch

context.description: The context path of the get, eg. the top level path plus object identifier.

oneOf.description: DEPRECATED: Prefer GET format with no array. A transport agnostic equivalent to a REST GET request. GET requests use 'request/response' semantics.

path.description: The path to set. A transport agnostic equivalent to a REST GET request. GET requests use 'request/response' semantics.
